item.title: World Cup: Costa Rica rebound from drubbing to stun Japan
item.description: World Cup: Costa Rica rebound from drubbing to stun Japan Soccer Football – FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022 – Group E – Japan v Costa Rica – Ahmad Bin Ali Stadium, Al Rayyan, Qatar – November 27, 2022 Costa Rica’s Keysher Fuller celebrates scoring their first goal with Yeltsin Tejeda REUTERS/Hannah Mckay AL RAYYAN, Qatar-Costa Rica put a huge dent in Japan’s hopes of reaching […]

item.title: PT Usha throws her hat into IOA ring, to fight for president’s post
item.description: PT Usha throws her hat into IOA ring, to fight for president’s post The legendary P T Usha on Saturday announced that she will contest for the post of Indian Olympic Association

item.title: UAAP: Tab Baldwin far from satisfied after Ateneo win over UP
item.description: UAAP: Tab Baldwin far from satisfied after Ateneo win over UP Ateneo coach Tab Baldwin during a game against UP in the UAAP Season 85 men’s basketball tournament.

item.title: Cristiano Ronaldo fined, suspended for two games for incident with fan at Goodison Park
item.description: Cristiano Ronaldo fined, suspended for two games for incident with fan at Goodison Park The 37-year-old is a free agent now after Manchester United announced his release from the contract on Tuesday.

item.title: Cuba calls up MLB baseball stars for first time
item.description: Cuba calls up MLB baseball stars for first time Yoan Lopez #44 of the New York Mets looks back at first base during the sixth inning against the Houston Astros at Minute Maid Park on June 22, 2022 in Houston, Texas.

item.title: Carlo Paalam wins gold in ASBC Asian championships
item.description: Carlo Paalam wins gold in ASBC Asian championships FILE – The Philippines’ Carlo Paalam reacts as he fights Britain’s Galal Yafai during their men’s fly (48-52kg) boxing final bout during the Tokyo 2020 Olympic Games at the Kokugikan Arena in Tokyo on August 7, 2021.

item.title: NBA: Kings send Lakers to fifth straight loss
item.description: NBA: Kings send Lakers to fifth straight loss De’Aaron Fox #5 of the Sacramento Kings celebrates after scoring a three-point basket late in the game against Los Angeles Lakers at Crypto.

item.title: World’s Rugby’s self-reinforcement on concussion is a problem for the sport | Andy Bull
item.description: World’s Rugby’s self-reinforcement on concussion is a problem for the sport | Andy Bull The latest conference, dominated by sceptics of recent research, will do nothing to bring clarity to the CTE debateAnother week, another conference.

item.description: Horse Racing: Elusive and Rising Tycoon shine in morning trials Elusive and Rising Tycoon impressed when the following horses were exercised at Malakpet Race Course on Tuesday morning.

item.title: T20 World Cup 2022 Super 12s: Australia v England – live
item.description: T20 World Cup 2022 Super 12s: Australia v England – live Updates from the crunch Group 1 match at the MCGStart time at the cricket in Melbourne is 7pm AEDT/9am BSTAny thoughts?

item.title: NBA: Losing scoring title to LeBron will be a ‘bitter pill’ for Kareem, says Magic
item.description: NBA: Losing scoring title to LeBron will be a ‘bitter pill’ for Kareem, says Magic Los Angeles Lakers forward LeBron James (6) drives to the basket during the fourth quarter against the Portland Trail Blazers at Crypto.

item.title: US health body rules collision sports cause CTE in landmark change
item.description: US health body rules collision sports cause CTE in landmark change US National Institutes of Health acknowledge causal linkConcussion in Sport Group conference takes place this weekIn a move that will have ramifications for collision sports, the US National Institutes of Health has formally acknowledged a causal link between repeated blows to the head and the neurodegenerative disease chronic traumatic encephalopathy (CTE).

item.title: Southampton v Arsenal: Premier League – live
item.description: Southampton v Arsenal: Premier League – live Match at St Mary’s kicks off at 2pm BSTGet in touch with Gregg via email or on TwitterThe teams are out at St Mary’s on what has ended up being a lovely day for football after the torrential showers earlier.
